非推奨のAPI

コンテンツ

  • 非推奨のインタフェース
  • 非推奨のクラス
  • 非推奨のメソッド
  • 非推奨のコンストラクタ
  • 非推奨のインタフェース 
    インタフェースと説明
    org.eclipse.jgit.transport.UploadPackLogger
    use PostUploadHook instead
  • 非推奨のクラス 
    クラスと説明
    org.eclipse.jgit.util.io.EolCanonicalizingInputStream
    use AutoLFInputStream instead
    org.eclipse.jgit.util.FileUtil
    org.eclipse.jgit.internal.storage.pack.PackWriter.Statistics
    Use PackStatistics instead.
    org.eclipse.jgit.util.io.SafeBufferedOutputStream
    use BufferedOutputStream in Java 8 and later.
    org.eclipse.jgit.transport.UploadPackLoggerChain
    Use PostUploadHookChain instead.
  • 非推奨のメソッド 
    メソッドと説明
    org.eclipse.jgit.lib.BitmapIndex.BitmapBuilder.add(AnyObjectId, int)
    use BitmapIndex.BitmapBuilder.or(org.eclipse.jgit.lib.BitmapIndex.Bitmap) or BitmapIndex.BitmapBuilder.addObject(org.eclipse.jgit.lib.AnyObjectId, int) instead.
    org.eclipse.jgit.util.FileUtil.canExecute(File)
    Use FileUtils.canExecute(File) instead
    org.eclipse.jgit.util.FileUtil.createSymLink(File, String)
    use FileUtils.createSymLink(File, String) instead
    org.eclipse.jgit.util.FileUtil.delete(File)
    use FileUtils.delete(File)
    org.eclipse.jgit.util.FileUtil.exists(File)
    Use Files.exists(java.nio.file.Path, java.nio.file.LinkOption...) instead
    org.eclipse.jgit.util.io.StreamCopyThread.flush()
    org.eclipse.jgit.util.FileUtil.getFileAttributesPosix(FS, File)
    Use FileUtils.getFileAttributesPosix(FS,File) instead
    org.eclipse.jgit.util.FileUtil.getLength(File)
    Use FileUtils.getLength(File) instead
    org.eclipse.jgit.transport.UploadPack.getLogger()
    Use UploadPack.getPreUploadHook().
    org.eclipse.jgit.transport.UploadPack.getPackStatistics()
    Use UploadPack.getStatistics().
    org.eclipse.jgit.treewalk.CanonicalTreeParser.getParent()
    internal use only
    org.eclipse.jgit.lib.Repository.getRef(String)
    Use Repository.exactRef(String) or Repository.findRef(String) instead.
    org.eclipse.jgit.transport.TransportHttp.httpOpen(String, URL)
    use TransportHttp.httpOpen(String, URL, AcceptEncoding) instead.
    org.eclipse.jgit.util.FileUtil.isDirectory(File)
    Use Files.isDirectory(java.nio.file.Path, java.nio.file.LinkOption...) instead
    org.eclipse.jgit.util.FileUtil.isFile(File)
    Use Files.isRegularFile(java.nio.file.Path, java.nio.file.LinkOption...) instead
    org.eclipse.jgit.util.FileUtil.isHidden(File)
    Use Files.isHidden(java.nio.file.Path) instead
    org.eclipse.jgit.util.FileUtil.isSymlink(File)
    Use Files.isSymbolicLink(java.nio.file.Path) instead
    org.eclipse.jgit.util.FileUtil.lastModified(File)
    Use Files.getLastModifiedTime(java.nio.file.Path, java.nio.file.LinkOption...) instead
    org.eclipse.jgit.util.FileUtil.normalize(File)
    Use FileUtils.normalize(File) instead
    org.eclipse.jgit.util.FileUtil.normalize(String)
    Use FileUtils.normalize(String) instead
    org.eclipse.jgit.util.FileUtil.readSymlink(File)
    use FileUtils.readSymLink(File) instead
    org.eclipse.jgit.internal.storage.file.WindowCache.reconfigure(WindowCacheConfig)
    use cfg.install() to avoid internal reference.
    org.eclipse.jgit.util.FileUtil.setHidden(File, boolean)
    Use FileUtils.setHidden(File,boolean) instead
    org.eclipse.jgit.util.FileUtil.setLastModified(File, long)
    Use Files.setLastModifiedTime(java.nio.file.Path, java.nio.file.attribute.FileTime) instead
    org.eclipse.jgit.transport.UploadPack.setLogger(UploadPackLogger)
    Use UploadPack.setPreUploadHook(PreUploadHook).
  • 非推奨のコンストラクタ 
    コンストラクタと説明
    org.eclipse.jgit.treewalk.FileTreeIterator(WorkingTreeIterator, File, FS)
    use FileTreeIterator.FileTreeIterator(FileTreeIterator, File, FS) instead.
    org.eclipse.jgit.internal.storage.file.LockFile(File, FS)
    use LockFile.LockFile(File) instead
